moves.7. Nc3: It's time to move the queen side knight. i think black will move Bb4.

moves.14... Rb8 15. b3 h6 16. Bxf6: and now he has to "lap" one pawn again

moves.22. f3 Rg8 23. Kc2 c6 24. a4 Rb8 25. Kb2: now i have a possibility to have got an advantage with 27.g5

opening: Ruy Lopez (C65), Berlin defence, Mortimer variation
